resorts.forecast_text: Sleet and freezing rain before 9pm, then sleet and freezing rain and a slight chance of snow between 9pm and 10pm, then snow and sleet and freezing rain between 10pm and 1am, then sleet and freezing rain and rain. Cloudy. Low around 27, with temperatures rising to around 35 overnight. Southeast wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible. Little or no ice accumulation expected.
